title: How to Learn Angular
content:
Angular is a comprehensive web application framework developed by Google. It provides a robust structure for building dynamic single-page applications (SPAs). Angular's two-way data binding, dependency injection, and modular architecture make it a powerful tool for developing complex applications.

To start learning Angular, familiarize yourself with TypeScript, as Angular is built on it. Then, dive into core concepts like components, directives, services, and routing. Angular's CLI and powerful ecosystem of libraries and tools make development efficient and scalable.
author: Ali
